excerpt: A delicious vegan twist on the classic meatball sub sandwich.
instructions: Place the vegan meatballs on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until heated through.
While the meatballs are cooking, heat the marinara sauce in a small saucepan over medium-low heat.
Once the meatballs are done, remove them from the oven and set aside.
Split the sub rolls in half and place them on a baking sheet.
Toast the rolls in the oven for 3-5 minutes, or until they are lightly browned and crispy.
Place 8 meatballs on each of the sub rolls, and spoon the warm marinara sauce over the meatballs.
Sprinkle the vegan parmesan cheese and chopped basil over the meatballs and marinara sauce.
Place the sub rolls back in the oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove the sub rolls from the oven and serve immediately.
